  • Method Details

    • getRooms

      Set<Room> getRooms()
      The method to receive a set of all rooms
      Returns:
      the set of all rooms

    • addRoom

      Boolean addRoom​(Room room)
      The method to add a new room for a session
      Parameters:
      room - the room that must be added to the set of rooms
      Returns:
      the boolean value, true - case when the room was successfully added, false - case when the room not possible to add

    • findRoomByStringId

      Optional<Room> findRoomByStringId​(String id)
      The method to find a room by its ID
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of a room from the set of all rooms
      Returns:
      the optional object, where a room in case if the room with @param id exists and null in case when the room doesn't exist

    • getClients

      Map<String,​org.springframework.web.socket.WebSocketSession> getClients​(Room room)
      The method to get a collection of all clients for the room
      Parameters:
      room - the room, which clients need to receive
      Returns:
      the Map where key - userName nad value - a session

    • addClient

      org.springframework.web.socket.WebSocketSession addClient​(Room room, String name, org.springframework.web.socket.WebSocketSession session)
      The method to add a client into the room
      Parameters:
      room - the room where the client must be added
      name - the name of the client
      session - a session of a client
      Returns:
      the session for added client

    • removeClientByName

      org.springframework.web.socket.WebSocketSession removeClientByName​(Room room, String name)
      The method to remove a client from the room by a name
      Parameters:
      room - the object of the room where the client must be removed
      name - the name of the client that must be removed
      Returns:
      the session for the removed client
